extendedInfo.description: Explore eight unique environments in this attractive bike physics game. Brought to you by the creators of the smash hit, MOTO X MAYHEM! Remove ads and get four more islands by purchasing the Long Weekend Pack in the game!If riding around doing wheelies and flips isn't enough for you, try grabbing the rider with your finger! Watch him ragdoll and bounce as you toss him about. Post highscores to Facebook or compete with the world in our global highscore database. Check the trailer out at SlumberShark.com!Keywords: bike bicycle motorbike motorcycle moto x mayhem physics ragdoll surreal dream sleep animal mascot pajama furries

reviews.title: Great alternative for kids!
reviews.comment: This game wasn\'t meant to be Moto X so I don\'t know why everyone is complaining! My 2yr old son loves it! Could do with a bit more variety on the courses but otherwise great game, graphics, physics and controls.
reviews.author: Tim Molepo

reviews.title: No Challenge
reviews.comment: I finished the game in 10 minutes flat. There wasn\'t any challenge in the game. It was just rolling up and down hills. It is a cute game, just wish it had that challenge factor like MX.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not what I expected
reviews.comment: the game was okay but everytime I selected something it would make a noxious sound and when I rode the bike
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too easy
reviews.comment: Too easy. There is always one simple way to get past it, like -go slow or go fast
reviews.author: Kierstin Berry

reviews.title: Very poor app.
reviews.comment: Nothing close to Moto Mayhem. Too easy with very little challenges.

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: It is a nice game but is very short. I finished it in 20 min. I love your games made by your team.thus I expect some more new games which I can play and tell my friends about them.

reviews.comment: Nice looking, but really easy. Sucks.

reviews.title: Motor cross is better
reviews.comment: Managed to complete the whole game with one button, literally had the phone sitting on a table and just held accelerate on and off, it was like kinect racing all over again
